definition: to pay sb else's expense with the expectation of being reimbursed by that person later
pad/cushion/mat/to pad out/to fill a gap/to pay for sb/to advance (money)
to pay/to hand over to/classifier for pairs or sets of things

sentences.english: The scheme is consisted of a package plan and a prepayment service for emergent medical treatment.
sentences.chinese: 本计划包包含一揽子保险项目及医疗垫付服务。

sentences.english: In case of a shortage of reserves, the people's government of the pooling region shall advance the payment.
sentences.chinese: 储备金不足支付的，由统筹地区的人民政府垫付。

sentences.english: You have to pay out of your own pocket, so save all the receipts from your business trip.
sentences.chinese: 你必须自己先垫付，所以你要保存出差时的所有单据。

sentences.english: I haven't any money now. Would you please pay the house rent for me?
sentences.chinese: 我现在手头没有钱，请你先帮我垫付一下房租吧。

sentences.english: The pre-paid charges, customs and taxes will be invoiced to you.
sentences.chinese: 海关税及进口增值税由我们垫付之后与您结算。

definition: to return (sth borrowed etc)/to send back/to refund/to rebate
to pay in full/to pay all of a bill/to pay off
